meanings.definition: To employ jointly or together with another.
meanings.sent1: The two companies are coemploying workers to complete the project.
meanings.sent2: We are coemploying a new assistant to help with the workload.
meanings.sent3: Coemploying with a friend can make work more enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: In the spirit of teamwork, they are coemploying their efforts to reach the goal.
meanings.sent5: By coemploying resources, they were able to achieve greater efficiency.

meanings.definition: The act of employing together with another.
meanings.sent1: Coemploying can lead to shared responsibilities and benefits.
meanings.sent2: The coemploying of staff from different departments can improve collaboration.
meanings.sent3: The coemploying of talents in the team created a dynamic work environment.
meanings.sent4: The success of the project was attributed to effective coemploying.
meanings.sent5: Through coemploying, they were able to combine their strengths for a common goal.
